name: rdd
description: Preview your Markdown locally as it would appear on GitHub, with live updating
author: Lim Yuan Qing

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build-css && yarn build-js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p build && cat src/css/style.css node_modules/highlight.js/styles/default.css node_modules/highlight.js/styles/github.css node_modules/github-markdown-css/github-markdown.css | csso --output build/style.css
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p build && browserify src/js/client.js | terser --compress --mangle --output build/script.js
